properties.description: Attractive three-bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well-presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi-folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double-sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three-piece suite with a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms. This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10-year building guarantee...

A luxurious four-bedroom detached house with a private garden, spacious living areas, and a newly renovated kitchen. The property is located in a prestigious neighborhood and is perfect for large families.
Modern one-bedroom flat in the heart of the city with an open-plan layout and a private balcony. Ideal for young professionals or investors.
Spacious five-bedroom house with a large garden, perfect for entertaining and family gatherings. Includes a double garage and modern interiors.
Three-bedroom flat with excellent transport links and modern amenities. Features a spacious living room and a recently renovated bathroom.
Charming two-bedroom house with a cozy atmosphere and close proximity to local amenities. Ideal for small families or couples.
